{{< fa book >}} documentation
::: ::: ## Overview `funestim` is a package that allows users to estimate the mean and the covariance of a functional dataset using an estimation of the regularity of the curves. The curves can be irregularly sampled. ### Installation ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("StevenGolovkine/funestim") ``` :::
